item.title: 黑石集团支持的Liftoff Mobile寻求在美国IPO募资7.62亿美元
item.description: Liftoff Mobile公司是一家由黑石集团支持的企业，致力于在移动应用程序中投放广告。该公司正计划通过首次公开募股筹集高达7.62亿美元的资金。【原文：Liftoff Mobile Inc., a Blackstone Inc.-backed company that helps place ads within mobile applications, is seeking to raise as much as $762 million in an initial public offering.】

item.title: 前贝莱德投资者加入哈德逊湾公司推动私募信贷业务
item.description: 知情人士透露，哈德逊湾资本管理公司已聘请一支前贝莱德公司高管团队，为这家管理着200亿美元资产的机构启动新的私募信贷策略。【原文：Hudson Bay Capital Management brought on a team of ex-BlackRock Inc. executives to start a new private credit strategy for the $20 billion money manager, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 参议院农业委员会推进加密货币市场法案
item.description: 参议院农业委员会以党派投票方式推进了其版本的数字资产市场结构法案，而另一委员会的关键议员们仍在就这项争议性法案的具体条款进行磋商。【原文：The Senate Agriculture Committee advanced its version of digital asset market structure legislation on a party-line vote, as key lawmakers on another panel continue to negotiate their piece of the contentious bill.】

item.title: Carvana股价反弹，分析师力挺公司抵御做空者
item.description: 卡瓦纳公司股价在大幅抛售后反弹，此前做空机构哥谭研究发布报告指控该公司虚报收益，华尔街分析师随即纷纷为这家在线二手车经销商的业务辩护。【原文：Carvana Co. shares bounced back from a steep selloff after Wall Street analysts rushed to defend the online used-car dealer’s business following a report from short seller Gotham City Research that accused the company of overstating earnings.】

item.title: 特朗普政府考虑对委内瑞拉石油实施透明化管理
item.description: 美国官方出口信贷机构负责人表示，特朗普政府仍在研究如何确保委内瑞拉石油销售收入的财务透明度。【原文：President Donald Trump’s administration is still working out how to ensure financial transparency for proceeds from sales of Venezuelan oil, according to the head of the official US export credit agency.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚最大管道运营商将为新建进口终端启动全球液化天然气招标
item.description: 哥伦比亚最大的管道运营商计划启动全球招标，为其正在建设的进口终端确保液化天然气的长期供应。【原文：Colombia’s largest pipeline operator plans to launch a global tender to secure long-term supplies of liquefied natural gas for an import terminal it’s constructing.】

item.title: 阿瑞斯签署16亿美元私募贷款以支持埃弗马克交易
item.description: 据周四声明显示，阿瑞斯管理公司旗下信贷基金牵头完成了一笔16亿美元的私募债务融资，用于支持苏瓦品牌公司与艾丽达美业的合并。【原文：Ares Management Corp. credit funds have led a $1.6 billion private debt financing to support the merger of Suave Brands Company and Elida Beauty, according to a statement Thursday.】

item.title: 美国检方起诉First Brands创始人帕特里克·詹姆斯
item.description: 去年这家破产的汽车零部件制造商倒闭后，First Brands集团创始人帕特里克·詹姆斯及其兄弟爱德华（该公司前高管）被纽约联邦检察官提起公诉。【原文：First Brands Group founder Patrick James and his brother Edward, a former executive at the company, were indicted by federal prosecutors in New York following the collapse of the bankrupt auto-parts maker last year.】

item.title: 瑞克·里德尔角逐美联储职位，令其在贝莱德的明星ETF前景蒙上阴影
item.description: 贝莱德公司正面临一个罕见的困境：其明星基金经理可能即将被挖角担任美联储主席，这为规模达14万亿美元的交易所交易基金行业中增长最快的主动型债券基金前景蒙上阴影。【原文：BlackRock Inc. is facing a rare conundrum: its star manager may soon be poached to head the Federal Reserve, clouding the outlook for the $14 trillion exchange-traded fund industry’s fastest-growing active bond vehicle.】

item.title: 西门子超越SAP成为德国市值最高企业
item.description: 西门子股份公司以市值计成为德国最大企业，超越了SAP SE。此前这家软件公司的股价因销售前景令人失望而暴跌。【原文：Siemens AG became Germany’s largest company by market value, overtaking SAP SE after the software firm’s shares plunged following a disappointing sales outlook.】

item.title: 尼日尔袭击事件危及奥拉诺矿址开采的铀资源
item.description: 袭击尼日尔首都的武装分子曾危险地接近一处铀矿储备点，该矿原属法国奥拉诺公司。【原文：Attackers who staged an assault on Niger’s capital came dangerously close to a stockpile of uranium removed from French company Orano SA’s mine.】

item.title: 瑞士力争豁免欧盟钢铁贸易壁垒
item.description: 瑞士召集欧盟贸易官员举行特别会议，力争豁免于欧盟对钢铁进口的保护性措施。【原文：Switzerland called a special meeting with European Union trade officials, pushing to be exempt from the bloc’s protective measures on steel imports.】

item.title: 加拿大与韩国承诺深化汽车制造业合作
item.description: 加拿大和韩国政府承诺将探讨将韩国汽车制造业引入加拿大的可能性，作为深化两国工业合作更广泛努力的一部分。【原文：The Canadian and South Korean governments promised to look at bringing Korean auto manufacturing to Canada as part of a broader effort to deepen industrial cooperation.】

item.title: 蓝猫投资者从科技主题基金撤出15.4%资产
item.description: 投资者从蓝猫资本公司旗下某科技主题基金中赎回了约15.4%的净资产，此前该基金在本月初大幅提高了投资者可赎回的金额上限。【原文：Investors pulled around 15.4% of net assets from one of Blue Owl Capital Inc.’s tech-focused funds, following the vehicle’s decision to dramatically increase the amount investors could withdraw earlier this month.】

item.title: 研究显示新冠疫情导致富裕国家死亡人数持续攀升
item.description: 疫情不仅提前了死亡时间。根据对34个国家数据的分析，在新冠疫情肆虐的大多数富裕国家，死亡率出现了持续上升，且这种上升趋势尚未完全消退。【原文：The pandemic didn’t just pull deaths forward in time. In most rich nations, Covid-19 left a lasting increase in mortality that has yet to fully unwind, according to an analysis of data from 34 countries.】

item.title: 华尔街专业人士在预测市场中看到机遇与挑战
item.description: 华尔街专业人士对预测市场普遍持积极态度，但这个新兴领域流动性不足的问题，是其走向主流的关键障碍。【原文：Wall Street professionals have a broadly positive perception of prediction markets, but the nascent sector’s lack of liquidity is a key stumbling block to reaching the mainstream.】

item.title: 智利出生率创历史新低，而亲生育政策支持者即将执政
item.description: 根据最新政府数据，智利总和生育率预计将在2025年降至低于1.0的水平，成为全球最低生育率国家之一。这一数据必将推动当选总统大力鼓励智利人多生育的政策。【原文：Chile’s total fertility rate is projected to have sunk in 2025 to less than one child per woman, among the world’s lowest, according to fresh government data that is sure to amplify the incoming president’s push to encourage Chileans to have more babies.】

item.title: 黑石集团的格雷认为人工智能颠覆各行业是最大风险
item.description: 尽管部分投资者正对人工智能领域即将出现的泡沫发出警告，但黑石集团总裁乔恩·格雷却将目光聚焦于该技术带来的另一种风险——某些行业的急速颠覆。【原文：While some investors are raising alarms of a looming bubble in artificial intelligence, Blackstone Inc. President Jon Gray is focused on a different risk tied to the technology — the rapid disruption of certain industries.】

item.title: 黄金在突破5500美元后遭遇突然抛售而回落
item.description: 金价创下自10月以来最大跌幅，此前因美元走强，金价曾一度上涨至每盎司5500美元以上的新高。【原文：Gold fell the most since October, reversing earlier gains that took the precious metal to a fresh record above $5,500 an ounce, as the US dollar strengthened.】

item.title: 如何在公司上市前进行投资
item.description:
在本期《万亿》节目中，我们将探讨如何获得私营公司股权这一难以捉摸的艺术。【原文：

On this episode of Trillions, we discuss the elusive art of getting a piece of a private company.

】

item.title: 南非静候美南非贸易协定投票结果，预计影响有限
item.description: 南非可能因一项提交美国国会的关键非洲贸易协定而失去进入美国市场的优惠待遇，但即使该国被排除在外，经济影响预计也将有限。【原文：South Africa risks losing preferential access to the US market under a key African trade pact that’s before Congress, though the economic impact would likely be limited even if the country is excluded.】

item.title: 华尔街为人工智能债券狂潮做准备，因市场恐慌情绪加剧
item.description: 华尔街正为人工智能项目筹措资金而准备掀起一场借贷狂潮，这可能推动2月份公司债券销售额创下历史新高，尽管信贷市场持续弥漫着警惕自满情绪的警告。【原文：Wall Street is gearing up for a borrowing bonanza to bankroll artificial intelligence projects that could push February corporate bond sales to a record, even as warnings against complacency continue to percolate across credit markets.】

item.title: 甲骨文市值较2025年峰值缩水半数，因市场对人工智能的谨慎态度升温
item.description: 甲骨文公司股价较去年历史高点已下跌逾50%，因投资者担忧人工智能行业前景及该公司与OpenAI的关联而纷纷抛售股票。【原文：Oracle Corp. shares have fallen more than 50% from last year’s all-time high as investors concerned about the artificial intelligence trade and the company’s links to OpenAI flee the stock.】

item.title: 瑞士央行行长施莱格尔称，瑞士物价压力基本未变
item.description: 瑞士国家银行行长马丁·施莱格尔表示，瑞士的通胀状况与去年基本持平。【原文：Switzerland’s inflation situation is basically unchanged from last year, according to Swiss National Bank President Martin Schlegel.】

item.title: 非洲金融公司称标普评级或助其吸引更多投资者
item.description: 非洲金融公司预计，其首次获得的标准普尔全球评级投资级信用评级将助力扩大股东基础、降低融资成本并实现资金来源多元化。【原文：Africa Finance Corp. expects its inaugural investment grade credit assessment from S&P Global Ratings to bolster the drive to expand its shareholder base, slash borrowing costs and diversify funding.】

item.title: 美国股市下跌，交易员权衡数十亿美元的人工智能支出计划
item.description: 周四美国股市下跌，交易员们在高消费科技股中筛选赢家与输家，抵消了共和党与民主党可能达成协议避免政府停摆的乐观情绪。【原文：US equities dropped on Thursday as traders sifted through the winners and losers among big-spending technology names, offsetting optimism that Republicans and Democrats may strike a deal to avoid a US government shutdown.】

item.title: 美元走软是全球投资者对冲风险的信号，联合集团表示
item.description: 资产管理公司联合赫尔墨斯公司表示，美元本月在美股和美债市场保持稳定的情况下持续走弱，表明全球投资者正在增加对美元贬值的对冲操作，而非抛售美国资产。【原文：The dollar’s slump this month in the face of steady US stock and bond markets suggests that global investors are raising their hedges against a weaker greenback rather than dumping American assets, says money manager Federated Hermes Inc.】

item.title: AMC与债权人达成修订协议，为再融资扫清障碍
item.description: 据周四提交的文件显示，AMC娱乐控股公司已与债权人集团达成协议，修改其其中一份票据的条款，这将使这家连锁影院更容易为其债务进行再融资。【原文：AMC Entertainment Holdings, Inc. reached a deal with a group of creditors to change the terms in one of its notes, making it easier for the cinema chain to refinance its debt, according to a filing on Thursday.】

item.title: 南园共同体筹建5亿美元基金打造"反加速器"
item.description: 南园共同体的投资者们意识到，有前途的创始人创业时可以寻求帮助的地方有很多。【原文：The investors at South Park Commons realize there are a lot of places that promising founders can go for help when they’re starting companies.】

item.title: 受38%利率吸引，套利交易投资者蜂拥涌入米莱的比索市场
item.description: 本世纪以来，阿根廷比索贬值幅度居全球主要货币之首，长期被视为过于动荡而难以吸引套利交易投资者。但随着总统哈维尔·米莱所在政党赢得中期选举胜利，投资者信心显著回升，越来越多的迹象表明，这些投资者正开始大量涌入比索市场。【原文：Having lost more of its value than any other major currency in the world this century, the Argentine peso has long been seen as far too unstable to lure carry-trade investors. But in a sign of just how much President Javier Milei has regained investor confidence in the wake of his party’s midterm-election victory, evidence is mounting that those investors are starting to pile into the peso.】
